version_description:
New in this release we joined the Federal Service, became Citizens and wiped out some bugs! If you get the movie reference then you can feel smug in front of your friends

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@trinitymirror.com

In life we look for compatibility, especially with our partners right?!
So we got all loved up with iOS 11 and made ourselves fully compatible ... its a beautiful thing!

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@trinitymirror.com

Yep its that time again, a minor release to fix some weird things going on. 
Have you ever not been able to scroll an article after you resized the text? Yeah us too, so we sorted it.
From time to time you may have seen two navigation bars, if you clicked an Ad or a weblink? - Proper weird that one, but it won’t happen anymore. 

So in the famous words of Maui; “You’re Welcome”.

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@trinitymirror.com

3.2.3
=====
Continuing our iPhone X improvements, and other little bug fixes

3.2 
===
Hold on to your hats because this release is a biggie! First up, the big three…

- The long awaited commenting feature. Sign up for a free account and join the conversation on any subject that matters to you. Go forth and natter.

- With your free account You can now bookmark articles for reading later and they are also synced to your other iOS devices.

- A new discover feature so you can explore more content and save any topic to your favorites easily

As well as all that we have added an all new tabbed navigation to help you get around even better, we fixed some bugs too, and laid the groundwork for more upcoming features, so stay tuned, this is just the beginning!

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@trinitymirror.com

3.2.3
We've fixed a few little bugs for you.

3.2 
Hold on to your hats because this release is a biggie! First up, the big three…

- The long awaited commenting feature. Sign up for a free account and join the conversation on any subject that matters to you. Go forth and natter.

- With your free account You can now bookmark articles for reading later and they are also synced to your other iOS devices.

- A new discover feature so you can explore more content and save any topic to your favorites easily

As well as all that we have added an all new tabbed navigation to help you get around even better, we fixed some bugs too, and laid the groundwork for more upcoming features, so stay tuned, this is just the beginning!

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@trinitymirror.com

We are back with a subtle update. Sure we have fixed some bugs like always, but we went a bit further and lashed some love on the video playback. No longer will you struggle on an iPhone X to interact with the controls. You can now even swipe up to dismiss a video, and if you really don't want to watch a video full screen, well now you can. All in all, a far better experience.

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@trinitymirror.com

No longer will you struggle on an iPhone X to interact with the controls. You can now even swipe up to dismiss a video, and if you really don't want to watch a video full screen, well now you can. All in all, a far better experience.

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@trinitymirror.com

This release is a big one. We gave the app some much needed love, actually a lot of love. The app now comes dressed in a lovely new iOS 11 inspired design. Our article teasers now allow you to jump straight to the comments with a single tap, and the ability to add that article to your bookmarks for reading later. We have much more visual treats coming soon, so stay tuned.

Bug Fixes:
Some users who got a push notification only to see the article load with a toolbar and tabbar at the same time. Proper strange and its now fixed!

Our article teasers now allow you to jump straight to the comments with a single tap, and the ability to add that article to your bookmarks for reading later. We have much more visual treats coming soon, so stay tuned.

Bug Fixes:
We have made a number of changes in the background to tidy up the code and minimise potential bugs.

We are back with a nice update for everyone. First up we have fixed some annoying bugs. Among them are fixes for article teaser headings that were being cropped quite often, so we have improved that across iPhone and iPad. Also, did you ever see a notification to download an app update you already had? Some of you did, so we have put a fix in place for that too. Other than bugs, we have also improved the UI to help you know what you can tap. The general rule, if it's our brand colour you can tap it! The in app notifications have also been given a lick of paint too! Enjoy.

We are back with just a very quick update to smooth out some wrinkles. We've fixed some reported bugs, done a lot of dusting and house cleaning in the background, emptying the trash, and set some stones in place for later releases. ''Nano Nano''

We are back with just a very quick update to smooth out some wrinkles. We've fixed some reported bugs, done a lot of dusting and house cleaning in the background, emptying the trash, and set some stones in place for later releases. ''Nano Nano''
A quick update to fix some little bugs behind the curtains. We have more on the way so stay tuned for another update coming soon.
A quick update to fix some little bugs behind the curtains. We have more on the way so stay tuned for another update coming soon.

We are back with a bug fix release that fixes some push notification issues for a small section of our users. Also some users were experiencing issues with pull to refresh, and loading articles from the teasers, so some improvements have been made there too. Stay tuned for more updates soon, au revoir!

We are back with a bug fix release that fixes some push notification issues for a small section of our users. Also some users were experiencing issues with pull to refresh, and loading articles from the teasers, so some improvements have been made there too. Stay tuned for more updates soon, au revoir!
We are back with a quick fire update, to fix a few of behind the scenes issues to make sure your experience is as smooth and enjoyable as possible.
We are back with a quick fire update, to fix a few of behind the scenes issues to make sure your experience is as smooth and enjoyable as possible.

In our first autumnal update, we would like to announce a big update to Voice Over Mode. This one is for our accessibility users, and it now actually works and rather well too! There are still improvements for us to make, and we will be continuing to work on this over the coming months, but for now we hope you like the new experience, and if you have any comments, please use the App Feedback option in “My Account” to let us know. 

We have also fixed a bunch of bugs, including the black screen issue when trying to play a video, reported by a small number of users. 

#StaySafe

In our first autumnal update, we would like to announce a big update to Voice Over Mode. This one is for our accessibility users, and it now actually works and rather well too! There are still improvements for us to make, and we will be continuing to work on this over the coming months, but for now we hope you like the new experience, and if you have any comments, please use the App Feedback option in “My Account” to let us know. 

We have also fixed a bunch of bugs, including the black screen issue when trying to play a video, reported by a small number of users. 

#StaySafe
